title: (x) Chanel Logo - custom, alt Sackers Gothic {Stephen}
content: Looking to identify the Chanel (NËš 5) typeface. Thank you in advance. -m
author: mpayson

comments.content: Custom, but [Sackers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20110227130029/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.2781.4.19&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=chanel&sampleSize=48) will get you close.
That is quite close. Thank you.

This is of course a custom designed logo, but you could come reasonably close with a couple of geometric sans faces, something like Gotham for example.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110227130029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chanel_3811.jpg)
Yes, of course, but would like to get as close as possible. Thanks.
I was talking about my reaction time. ;^)
